body: Those who cling to petty morals have no understanding of what true freedom and power is. The fact is, you enjoyed your part in the conflict and would do it all over again if the opportunity presented itself. Many people know of your misdeed, and they also realize your complete lack of remorse.
name: You Enjoyed It (+3 CP)
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Background Generator/Step 3-Moral Conflicts/Relationships/and Drawbacks/Resolution/You Enjoyed It (+3 CP)
